attributes.action: Make it an offence to pay EU billions in UK tax payers money on Brexit
attributes.background:
The EU are trying to gain a massive financial gain from Britain through Brexit. They are holding us to ransom. There should be NO fee levied by the EU for Britain leaving.

Jean Claude Junker and Angela Merkel are simply wanting a 'fine' for Britain for using what is a legal RIGHT.

rejection.details:
If you would like the UK to leave the EU immediately without a deal, you could sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/200165

You could also start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
